node.doctext:
Discussion arena for [britnoders] attending nodermeets. Join to discuss the time and place for the next soiree and vote on the venue. Be in it to have a say, and help keep the gibber-gabber out of britnoders!

[la petite mort] is yer gal for adding and removing members, so to speak.
node.title: Informal Britnoders Soirée
